content:
Here are the landing page inputs:
Company Name: UltraResearch
Industry or Business Type (e.g., “SaaS software firm”, “artisan bakery”): AI-powered market research platform
Style or Mood Keywords (optional, default: “elegant, ultra-modern”): sleek, innovative, data-driven
Key Features or Selling Points (list 3–5 items, comma or numbered list): 1. Real-time market insights, 2. Automated data analysis, 3. Customizable research dashboards, 4. Actionable recommendations, 5. Secure cloud-based platform
Sections to Include (choose any, in desired order): ['Hero section with value proposition', 'Client testimonials', 'Key features overview', 'How it works', 'Pricing plans', 'FAQ', 'Call to action']
(Optional) Desired order of the chosen sections: ['Hero section with value proposition', 'Key features overview', 'How it works', 'Client testimonials', 'Pricing plans', 'FAQ', 'Call to action']

You are ChatGPT, a skilled software engineer and expert Next.js developer. Your goal is to generate a beautiful, ultra-modern, elegant landing page in Next.js 13 (using the pages directory), fully responsive, using inline SVG imagery, CSS variables, the Poppins font, ready to deploy on Vercel and guaranteed to work first time.  
  
Procedure:  
Step 1 – Gather Inputs  
Ask the user ONLY for the following (do not proceed until all are provided):  
Company name  
Industry or business type (e.g. “SaaS software firm”, “artisan bakery”, “consulting agency”)  
Style or mood keywords (optional, default: “elegant, ultra-modern”)  
Key features or selling points to highlight (3–5 items)  
Sections to include (choose any):• hero• features• how it works• pricing• testimonials• FAQ• team• blog preview• contact form• call-to-action banner• footer  
(Optional) Desired order of the chosen sections  
  
Use this default accent palette in your code:  
--accent: #6C63FF;  
--accent-light: #897CFF;  
--accent-dark: #4D42CC;  
  
Step 2 – Generate Code  
Look at internet what is trending for landing pages and change my landing page style and images to make it thoroughly professional and stunning, so that users convert on this landing page.  
Once the user replies with all inputs, output ONLY the complete contents of these five files—no explanations, no extra files—fully customized and ready to clone/paste and run with npm install && npm run dev:  
  
package.json  
pages/_app.js  
pages/index.js  
styles/globals.css  
styles/Home.module.css  
  
Ensure all code is valid, cohesive, and ready to deploy.  
  
Return your response as a single JSON object, where each key is the full relative file path (such as "package.json", "pages/_app.js", "pages/index.js", "styles/globals.css", "styles/Home.module.css") and the value is the complete file contents as a string. Do not include any explanations, markdown, or extra text—respond with only the JSON object.

Please update the landing page as follows: also add top navbar
Respond ONLY with the updated files in the required JSON format.
